description: DePayLaunchpadV1.releasePayments() (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#218-221) ignores return value by ERC20(paymentToken).transfer(owner(),ERC20(paymentToken).balanceOf(address(this))) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#219)
DePayLaunchpadV1.releaseUnclaimed() (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#224-229) ignores return value by ERC20(launchedToken).transfer(owner(),unclaimed) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#226)

DePayLaunchpadV1.claim(address,uint256,bool) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#152-167) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-payedAmount = claimedAmount.div(10 ** ERC20(paymentToken).decimals()).mul(price) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#160)
markdown:
[DePayLaunchpadV1.claim(address,uint256,bool)](contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#L152-L167) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[payedAmount = claimedAmount.div(10 ** ERC20(paymentToken).decimals()).mul(price)](contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#L160)

description:
Reentrancy in DePayLaunchpadV1._release(address) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#184-197):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(launchedToken).safeTransfer(splitReleaseAddress,splitReleaseAmount) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#190)
	- ERC20(launchedToken).safeTransfer(forAddress,claimedAmount.sub(splitReleaseAmount)) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#191)
	- ERC20(launchedToken).safeTransfer(forAddress,claimedAmount) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#193)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claims[forAddress] = 0 (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#195)

description:
DePayLaunchpadV1.init(address,address,uint256,address) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#60-73) should emit an event for: 
	- launchedToken = _launchedToken (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#66)

DePayLaunchpadV1.init(address,address,uint256,address) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#60-73) should emit an event for: 
	- splitReleaseAmount = _splitReleaseAmount (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#69) 
	- totalClaimable = ERC20(launchedToken).balanceOf(address(this)) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#70)

DePayLaunchpadV1.start(uint256,uint256) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#96-105) should emit an event for: 
	- price = _price (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#103)

DePayLaunchpadV1.init(address,address,uint256,address)._launchedToken (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#61) lacks a zero-check on :
		- launchedToken = _launchedToken (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#66)

DePayLaunchpadV1.init(address,address,uint256,address)._paymentToken (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#62) lacks a zero-check on :
		- paymentToken = _paymentToken (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#67)

DePayLaunchpadV1.init(address,address,uint256,address)._splitReleaseAddress (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#64) lacks a zero-check on :
		- splitReleaseAddress = _splitReleaseAddress (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#68)

Reentrancy in DePayLaunchpadV1.claim(address,uint256,bool) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#152-167):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(paymentToken).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),payedAmount) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#161)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claims[forAddress] = claims[forAddress].add(claimedAmount) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#162)
	- totalClaimed = totalClaimed.add(claimedAmount) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#164)
markdown:

	- [totalClaimed = totalClaimed.add(claimedAmount)](contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#L164)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(_endTime > block.timestamp,endTime needs to be in the future!)

	- require(bool,string)(_endTime > block.timestamp,endTime needs to be in the future!) (contracts/DePayLaunchpadV1.sol#100)
